title: i still got like 70 project cores
body: They said you will get essences but why I still have them.

replies.body: You will be able to disenchant them for essence in the future, but I don't have a specific date or time when that change will roll out. Keep your eyes on the [News Page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) for when this is announced. Let me know if you have any questions.
I think the option to disenchant project materials is coming in a future patch.
